snippet: Przemyslaw Niemiec of Poland won the mountainous 15th stage of the Vuelta a España while Alberto Contador kept the overall lead for the fifth consecutive day.
abstract: Poland's Przemyslaw Niemiec wins mountainous 15th stage of Vuelta a Espana bicycle race; Spain's Alberto Contador retains overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Przemyslaw Niemiec of Poland won the mountainous 15th stage of the Vuelta a España while Alberto Contador kept the overall lead for the fifth consecutive day.

headline.main: Contador Maintains Edge in Vuelta a España
